resources.string: Tap title to re-name, or tap Yes to overwrite.
If you have a moment, Please rate this app.
If you have a moment, Please rate this app.
Visit the Play Store to upgrade to the paid version. 20 measures, no ads, less permissions.
Choose an item for setup information.
No more items available for purchase. Thank you!
Error connecting to Google Play..\nPlease diagnose connectivity/account issues and try again.
Rate this app on the Google Play Store
Problem setting up In-App Billing on this device.
Sticking less than or equal to 4

Create, Play, Email, and Print a page of a 20-bar "Stick Control"-esque composition.

Re-Generate, Save, and Email the composition using the icons of the action bar on the playback screen.

Change the title by tapping on the 'Untitled' text at the top of the playback screen.

There is a one measure count off(in 4/4) that precedes the composition.

From the Home page, select 'Saved' to view your compositions.

This app requires the following permissions:

		Google Play License Check 

		prevent phone from sleeping
Choose one or more time signatures that will loop sequentially throughout the exercise.\n\nDefault is 4/4.
Choose one or more rhythmic patterns that will loop sequentially throughout the exercise.\n\nDefault is sixteenths.

Enter combinations of one or more patterns you would like to see appear within the composition.

Default will be "random" singles and doubles. 
		R = accented Right hand 
		r = unaccented right hand
		L = accented Left hand
		l = unaccented left hand 

* - Sticking patterns will appear as bold in the composition.

Enter a sticking pattern that will repeat throughout the composition.


		R = accented Right hand 
		r = unaccented right hand
		L = accented Left hand
		l = unaccented left hand
If no stickings are entered, a random series of unaccented singles, doubles, and accented singles will be generated. You can tap the \'REGENERATE\' button to create a new random series.
After generating the exercise, select one or several adjacent beats and press play.\n\nDrag the arrow above the scroll pane set the playback position.

Check this box if you want the composition to only contain the sticking(s) that you have entered.\n\nIf there is only one sticking pattern, it will be repeated throughout the entirety of the composition.

For best results on Windows machines, un-check the "Fit Picture to Frame", so that the entire composition is printed. 

Similar modifications might be necessary on other printing configurations.

Feel free to send questions and comments to the Facebook page referenced at the bottom of this page.
Please visit the facebook page to send feedback, and share your experiences.

An alternate way to enter stickings. 

Choose from a list of pre-defined stickings(this list is far from all-inclusive). 

Click "Add" to add the stickings to the sticking preferences list. 

You can also build a sticking pattern from the pre-sets by selecting multiple patterns, clicking the "Concat" button so that they will all be combined into one pattern, and then "Add".

An alternate way to enter stickings. 

Choose from a list of pre-defined stickings(this list is far from all-inclusive). 

Click "Add" to add the stickings to the sticking preferences list.
